items.sentence: I had to keep busy, so I wouldn\'t think about what had happened.
I hadn\'t planned to do that, but I can if you really want me to.
I have no doubt in my mind you are the woman I\'m going to marry.
All the English teachers at my son\'s school are native speakers.
I found this bottle when I was walking on the beach this morning.
I hope that I gave you enough money to buy everything you needed.
I spent a great deal of time dealing with that problem last week.
I still owe my brother the ten dollars that he lent me last week.
How did you know Tom wasn\'t planning to attend today\'s meeting?
Let\'s ask the neighbors to look after the dog while we\'re away.
